class.name: PhysicsBoneCompensation3D
class.brief_description: This node allows child [PhysicsBone3D] nodes to inherit the velocity and rotational changes of another Physics body.
class.description: This node allows child [PhysicsBone3D] nodes to inherit the velocity and rotational changes of another physics body. As an example, very often a [Skeleton3D] node is a child of some [KinematicBody3D]. Without this node, simulating [PhysicsBone3D] will not inherit velocity and rotational changes and appear to "stretch" and have exaggerated movement.

members.member: The path to the [PhysicsBody3D] node to track.
